QuestData.Title: The Sacrifices We Must Make
QuestData.Description:
Hurry! We can use the animacones we gathered to save Derawyn.
I know they're intended for the wildseeds... but we can't let these monsters take anyone else from us.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the recovered animacones to save Wagonmaster Derawyn.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet Niya further in the Shrouded Mire.
QuestData.RewardText:
The heart of the grove...
We have to get it back... for all those who have fallen.
